INIT().details: This function is called when the module is installed or upgraded by the kernel.MUST BE GATED BY onlyKernel. Used to encompass any initialization or upgrade logic.

returns.major_: - Major version upgrade indicates breaking change to the interface.
returns.minor_: - Minor version change retains backward-compatible interface.

getCreditAccount(address).details: Returns zeroed account after full repayment or default.

updateCreditAccount(address,uint256,uint.details: Will request or send bAssets to/from the caller

VERSION().notice: Returns which semantic version of a module is being implemented.

changeKernel(address).notice: Function used by kernel when migrating to a new kernel.

defaultOutstanding().notice: Default all outstanding credit. Loops through defaultable queue and         clears all expired credit and collateral.

defaultSelf().notice: Allow anyone to default their own account

getCreditAccount(address).notice: Gets current credit account for user.

lastDefaultedTimeslot().notice: Last timeslot that was defaulted, acts as queue iterator

updateCreditAccount(address,uint256,uint.notice: Updates the credit account for a user

documentation.text: @notice Individual credit account information per user
@notice Container for aggregate credit and collateral to be defaulted at a timeslot
@notice Last timeslot that was defaulted, acts as queue iterator

@notice Gets current credit account for user.
 @dev    Returns zeroed account after full repayment or default.

@notice Updates the credit account for a user
 @dev    Will request or send bAssets to/from the caller
@notice Allow anyone to default their own account

@notice Default all outstanding credit. Loops through defaultable queue and
         clears all expired credit and collateral.
